<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.SgReferenceQualifiers</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Reference Qualifiers for SG</description>
        <name>SgReferenceQualifiers</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var SgReferenceQualifiers = Class.create();
SgReferenceQualifiers.prototype = {
	getGroupedInputReferenceQualifier: function() {
		return 'input_type=qr_barcode^parameter_type=';
	},

	filterEmbeddedScreensForFormSegment: function() {
		return 'sys_class_name=sys_sg_details_screen^ORsys_class_name=sys_sg_activity_stream_screen^ORsys_class_name=sys_sg_sections_screen^ORsys_class_name=sys_sg_related_lists_screen^ORsys_class_name=sys_sg_list_screen^ORsys_class_name=sys_sg_browser_screen';
	},

	type: 'SgReferenceQualifiers'
};
]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2019-11-18 17:49:02</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>2430fc4417110010f2b43b9fadb9598a</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>SgReferenceQualifiers</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Mobile plugin" source="com.glide.sg">0ced34cb6d2220100acb70b3534330d3</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_2430fc4417110010f2b43b9fadb9598a</sys_update_name>

    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
